sentence.Network_en: Fortunately, the official at Window 12 didn't peg me counterrevolutionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 还好, 12号窗口的警察没有把我定为反革命.

sentence.Network_en: The counterrevolutionary revolt was quickly got under.
sentence.Network_cn: 反革命叛乱很快被镇压下去了.

sentence.Network_en: The Central Committee of the Party headed by Comrade Mao Tse - tung fought these counterrevolutionary elements resolutely.
sentence.Network_cn: 以毛泽东同志为首的党中央,同这些反革命分子进行了坚决的斗争.

PerfectNetExp.abs: counterpain的意思是什么_百度知道 ... counteroffer 还价，还盘 counterrevolutionary 反革命分子 counter 前缀，表示对抗，反对.
counter- == oppositecounterrevolutionary 反动的countermeasure 对策，应策

list.abs: attempt in vain to slap together a counterrevolutionary alliance妄图拼凑一个反革命同盟
[suppress counterrevolutionaries] 镇压、管制反革命分子 ◎ 镇服 zhènfú [subdue] 用威力使服从镇服天下 ◎ 镇唬 zhènhǔ [frighten][口]∶镇吓蒙唬.
the Central Committee of the Party headed by Comrade Mao Tse-tung fought these counterrevolutionary elements resolutely .以毛泽东同志为首的党中央，同这些反革命分子进行了坚决的斗争。
active citizens 积极公民active counterrevolutionary 现行反革命分子-

entry.def: Counter-revolutionary activities are activities intended to reverse the effects of a previous revolution.
A counter-revolu-tionary is a person who is trying to reverse the effects of a previous revolution.

means.word_mean: 1. a revolutionary whose aim is to reverse the changes introduced by an earlier revolution
1. marked by opposition or antipathy to revolution;

auth_sentence.content: But those reflections have been deemed counterrevolutionary by Cuban authorities.
auth_sentence.res_content: But those reflections have been deemed counterrevolutionary by Cuban authorities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But those reflections have been deemed counterrevolutionary by Cuban authorities.
